metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25864 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
HashiCorp Consul and Consul Enterprise up to version 1.9.4 key-value (KV) raw mode was vulnerable to cross-site scripting. Fixed in 1.9.5, 1.8.10 and 1.7.14.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25864` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

consul - 1.10.12+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: consul package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.12+dfsg1-1').
